description:
At the law firm of Hastings, Cohan & Walsh, LLP, we are committed to helping you secure the maximum compensation for the damages you incurred as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

The attorneys at our law firm possess over 100 years of combined legal experience, and our mission is to provide world-class legal services. We have achieved success handling all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, advocating on behalf of those in need. The attorneys at our firm have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our clients, earning our membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and establishing our reputation as one of the top injury practices in the region.

Our strategy is straightforward - we provide individualized representation and use our experience, knowledge and preparation to maximize results. We will learn about your case and your goals and will develop a strong legal strategy.

We are so confident in our ability to represent you, that we offer a unique No Cost, No Fee 30-Day Guarantee. If at any time during the first 30 days after hiring our firm for your personal injury case, you are not satisfied for any reason, with our services or the way we handle your case, you may remove your file from our office and owe us no costs and no attorney fees with no questions asked.

This means that you can expect to receive the highest level of service and support from a local attorney you can trust with your most sensitive legal issues.We will provide personalized and dedicated legal representation and help you and your family through your difficult and uncertain time.

From our office in Ridgefield, CT, we serve clients throughout Fairfield County and the rest of the state. For more information on how Hastings, Cohan & Walsh, LLP, can best serve your needs, you can contact our law office or visit our website to schedule a free case evaluation.
